trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Eureka
There were no other sightings in Eureka on or around December 3rd 2012
divs: sighting details(1)i heard if you filmed the sun you could\would film a ufo. so i did, and got a fast moving object that i only saw it when reviewing my video recording (2). (3) when i first reviewed the footage i saw a quick black blip on the screen and knew it was something that i could not identify without further investigation. so, i slowed it down and looked. (4) there are three frames. the first two show something orb-like in shape. the third frame, closest to the sun, shows a reflection and maybe even a shadow from the saucer part (thus i am inclined to say it was a saucer with a dome, kinda like a hat). (5) during the sighting i was skeptical that i would actually film something since i was intentionally trying to debunk a claim that i would see something if i filmed the sun. after i saw the footage i was very intrigued and excited. (6) i did not even see it with the naked eye.
